verses.verse: And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.

¶ And there was a certain <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> of Zorah <S%H6881><s%>, of the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Danites <S%H1839><s%>, whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Manoah <S%H4495><s%>; and his wife <S%H802><s%> was barren <S%H6135><s%>, and bare <S%H3205><s%> not.

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> unto the woman <S%H802><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto her, Behold now, thou art barren <S%H6135><s%>, and bearest <S%H3205><s%> not: but thou shalt conceive <S%H2029><s%>, and bear <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>.
Now therefore beware <S%H8104><s%>, I pray thee, and drink <S%H8354><s%> not wine <S%H3196><s%> nor strong drink <S%H7941><s%>, and eat <S%H398><s%> not any unclean <S%H2931><s%> thing:

For, lo, thou shalt conceive <S%H2030><s%>, and bear <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>; and no rasor <S%H4177><s%> shall come <S%H5927><s%> on his head <S%H7218><s%>: for the child <S%H5288><s%> shall be a Nazarite <S%H5139><s%> unto God <S%H430><s%> from the womb <S%H990><s%>: and he shall begin <S%H2490><s%> to deliver <S%H3467><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>.

¶ Then the woman <S%H802><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H559><s%> her husband <S%H376><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, A man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> came <S%H935><s%> unto me, and his countenance <S%H4758><s%> was like the countenance <S%H4758><s%> of an angel <S%H4397><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, very <S%H3966><s%> terrible <S%H3372><s%>: but I asked <S%H7592><s%> him not whence he was, neither told <S%H5046><s%> he me his name <S%H8034><s%>:

But he said <S%H559><s%> unto me, Behold, thou shalt conceive <S%H2030><s%>, and bear <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>; and now drink <S%H7941><s%> no wine <S%H3196><s%> nor strong drink <S%H8354><s%>, neither eat <S%H398><s%> any unclean <S%H2932><s%> thing: for the child <S%H5288><s%> shall be a Nazarite <S%H5139><s%> to God <S%H430><s%> from the womb <S%H990><s%> to the day <S%H3117><s%> of his death <S%H4194><s%>.

¶ Then Manoah <S%H4495><s%> intreated <S%H6279><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, O <S%H994><s%> my Lord <S%H136><s%>, let <S%H4994><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> which thou didst send <S%H7971><s%> come again <S%H935><s%> unto us, and teach <S%H3384><s%> us what we shall do <S%H6213><s%> unto the child <S%H5288><s%> that shall be born <S%H3205><s%>.

And God <S%H430><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Manoah <S%H4495><s%>; and the angel <S%H4397><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> came again <S%H935><s%> unto the woman <S%H802><s%> as she sat <S%H3427><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%>: but Manoah <S%H4495><s%> her husband <S%H376><s%> was not with her.

And the woman <S%H802><s%> made haste <S%H4116><s%>, and ran <S%H7323><s%>, and shewed <S%H5046><s%> her husband <S%H376><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Behold, the man <S%H376><s%> hath appeared <S%H7200><s%> unto me, that came <S%H935><s%> unto me the other day <S%H3117><s%>.

And Manoah <S%H4495><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> after <S%H310><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Art thou the man <S%H376><s%> that spakest <S%H1696><s%> unto the woman <S%H802><s%>? And he said <S%H559><s%>, I am.

And Manoah <S%H4495><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Now let thy words <S%H1697><s%> come to pass <S%H935><s%>. How shall we order <S%H4941><s%> the child <S%H5288><s%>, and how shall we do <S%H4639><s%> unto him?
And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Manoah <S%H4495><s%>, Of all that I said <S%H559><s%> unto the woman <S%H802><s%> let her beware <S%H8104><s%>.

She may not eat <S%H398><s%> of any thing that cometh <S%H3318><s%> of the vine <S%H1612><s%>, neither let her drink <S%H8354><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> or strong drink <S%H7941><s%>, nor eat <S%H398><s%> any unclean <S%H2932><s%> thing: all that I commanded <S%H6680><s%> her let her observe <S%H8104><s%>.

¶ And Manoah <S%H4495><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, I pray thee, let us detain <S%H6113><s%> thee, until we shall have made ready <S%H6213><s%> a kid <S%H1423><s%> <S%H5795><s%> for <S%H6440><s%> thee.

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Manoah <S%H4495><s%>, Though thou detain <S%H6113><s%> me, I will not eat <S%H398><s%> of thy bread <S%H3899><s%>: and if <S%H518><s%> thou wilt offer <S%H6213><s%> a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, thou must offer <S%H5927><s%> it unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>. For Manoah <S%H4495><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> not that he was an angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And Manoah <S%H4495><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, What is thy name <S%H8034><s%>, that when thy sayings <S%H1697><s%> come to pass <S%H935><s%> we may do thee honour <S%H3513><s%>?
And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Why askest <S%H7592><s%> thou thus after my name <S%H8034><s%>, seeing it is secret <S%H6383><s%> <S%H6383><s%>?

So Manoah <S%H4495><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> a kid <S%H1423><s%> <S%H5795><s%> with a meat offering <S%H4503><s%>, and offered <S%H5927><s%> it upon a rock <S%H6697><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: and the angel did <S%H6213><s%> wondrously <S%H6381><s%>; and Manoah <S%H4495><s%> and his wife <S%H802><s%> looked on <S%H7200><s%>.

For it came to pass, when the flame <S%H3851><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> toward heaven <S%H8064><s%> from off the altar <S%H4196><s%>, that the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> ascended <S%H5927><s%> in the flame <S%H3851><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>. And Manoah <S%H4495><s%> and his wife <S%H802><s%> looked on <S%H7200><s%> it, and fell on <S%H5307><s%> their faces <S%H6440><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%>.

But the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> did no more <S%H3254><s%> appear <S%H7200><s%> to Manoah <S%H4495><s%> and to his wife <S%H802><s%>. Then Manoah <S%H4495><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> that he was an angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
And Manoah <S%H4495><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto his wife <S%H802><s%>, We shall surely <S%H4191><s%> die <S%H4191><s%>, because we have seen <S%H7200><s%> God <S%H430><s%>.

But his wife <S%H802><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, If <S%H3863><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> were pleased <S%H2654><s%> to kill <S%H4191><s%> us, he would not have received <S%H3947><s%> a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> and a meat offering <S%H4503><s%> at our hands <S%H3027><s%>, neither would he have shewed <S%H7200><s%> us all these things, nor would as at this time <S%H6256><s%> have told <S%H8085><s%> us such things as these <S%H2063><s%>.

¶ And the woman <S%H802><s%> bare <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>, and called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Samson <S%H8123><s%>: and the child <S%H5288><s%> grew <S%H1431><s%>, and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> him.

And the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> began <S%H2490><s%> to move him at times <S%H6470><s%> in the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> between Zorah <S%H6881><s%> and Eshtaol <S%H847><s%>.
